name: get_environment_info
description: Get information about the connected Dynatrace Environment (Tenant) and verify the connection and authentication

name: execute_dql
description: Get Logs, Metrics, Spans or Events from Dynatrace GRAIL by executing a Dynatrace Query Language (DQL) statement

name: verify_dql
description: Syntactically verify a Dynatrace Query Language (DQL) statement before executing it

name: list_problems
description: List all problems (dt.davis.problems) known on Dynatrace, sorted by recency, for the last 12h

parameters.name: maxProblemsToDisplay
parameters.description: Maximum number of problems to display (default: 25)

name: list_vulnerabilities
description: Retrieve all active (non-muted) vulnerabilities from Dynatrace for the last 30 days

name: find_entity_by_name
description: Find the entityId and type of a monitored entity (service, host, process-group, application, kubernetes-node, etc.) based on name

parameters.name: entityName
parameters.description: Name of the entity to find

name: get_ownership
description: Get detailed Ownership information for one or multiple entities on Dynatrace

name: generate_dql_from_natural_language
description: Convert natural language queries to Dynatrace Query Language (DQL) using Davis CoPilot AI

name: explain_dql_in_natural_language
description: Explain Dynatrace Query Language (DQL) statements in natural language using Davis CoPilot AI

name: chat_with_davis_copilot
description: Ask any Dynatrace-related question when no other specific tool is available

name: send_slack_message
description: Send a Slack message to a dedicated Slack Channel via Slack Connector on Dynatrace

name: send_email
description: Send an email using the Dynatrace Email API

name: create_workflow_for_notification
description: Create a notification workflow for a team based on a problem type within Workflows in Dynatrace

name: make_workflow_public
description: Modify a workflow and make it publicly available to everyone on the Dynatrace Environment

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: ID of the workflow to modify

name: get_kubernetes_events
description: Get all events from a specific Kubernetes (K8s) cluster

name: reset_grail_budget
description: Reset the Grail query budget after it was exhausted, allowing new queries to be executed
